title: How to Make Raw Hummus

steps.headline: Soak the nuts.
steps.description: Soak the almonds overnight.. However, only soak the cashews for around 2 hours. The cashews shouldn't be soaked as long since they are softer, and if left longer in the water, they might disintegrate. Chop both nuts into pieces once soaked.

steps.headline: Clean the zucchini.
steps.description: Peel the cleaned zucchini, then cut it into small slices.

steps.headline: Blend the ingredients.
steps.description: Blend all of the ingredients together until the dip becomes creamy. For the best effect, check the consistency and add a bit of water if necessary.

steps.headline: Serve with chopped parsley as a dip.
steps.description: Decorate the dip with parsley leaves, olive oil and some nuts. Serve with fresh veggies.

text: Soak the nuts. Soak the almonds overnight.. However, only soak the cashews for around 2 hours. The cashews shouldn't be soaked as long since they are softer, and if left longer in the water, they might disintegrate. Chop both nuts into pieces once soaked. Clean the zucchini. Peel the cleaned zucchini, then cut it into small slices. Blend the ingredients. Blend all of the ingredients together until the dip becomes creamy. For the best effect, check the consistency and add a bit of water if necessary. Serve with chopped parsley as a dip. Decorate the dip with parsley leaves, olive oil and some nuts. Serve with fresh veggies.
